prepares.PageData: SELECT ID as name, NAME as title, DESCRIPTION as overview, MATURITY_LEVEL as maturity, FUNCTION as functionality, PARENT as parent, TYPE as category FROM {{{table}}} WHERE ID=$id
prepares.ChildData: SELECT ID as name, NAME as title FROM {{{table}}} WHERE PARENT=$id
prepares.RelationChildData: SELECT ID as name, NAME as title FROM {{{totable}}} WHERE ID IN(SELECT TO_KEY as key FROM MAPPING WHERE TO_TABLE == $totable AND FROM_KEY IN ({{{ids}}}) AND FROM_TABLE == $fromtable UNION SELECT FROM_KEY as key FROM MAPPING WHERE FROM_TABLE == $totable AND TO_KEY IN ({{{ids}}}) AND TO_TABLE == $fromtable)
